description: This file declares functions for managing the harvesting status related to Neighbor Access Point (AP) on-demand scans in a network management context. It contains function prototypes for setting and getting the harvesting status, and includes licensing and include guards.

methods.name: SetNAPOnDemandHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Sets the harvesting status for neighbor AP on-demand scans, returning 0 on success and 1 on failure.

methods.name: GetNAPOnDemandHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Retrieves the current harvesting status for neighbor AP on-demand scans, returning true if enabled and false if disabled.
